languages.text: {n}Маражай суживает глаза.{/n} "Не разыгрывай из себя наивн{mf|ого|ую} мон-кай, {name}. Когда-нибудь это произойдет. Когда-нибудь". {n}Он легко дотрагивается до вашего лица пальцами в когтистой металлической перчатке, его губы трогает улыбка.{/n} "Но не сейчас".

{n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Do not play coy, mon-keigh. It will happen, {name}. One day." {n}He gently caresses your face with his fingers clad in his clawed metal glove, smiling.{/n} "But not just yet."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай суживает глаза.{/n} "Не разыгрывай из себя наивн{mf|ого|ую} мон-кай, {name}. Когда-нибудь это произойдет. Когда-нибудь". {n}Он легко дотрагивается до вашего лица пальцами в когтистой металлической перчатке, его губы трогает улыбка.{/n} "Но не сейчас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Do not play coy, mon-keigh. Someday it will happen. Someday." {n}He gently caresses your face with the fingers in clad in a metal glove, smiling.{/n} "But not just yet."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Do not play coy, mon-keigh. It will happen, {name}. One day." {n}He gently caresses your face with his fingers clad in his clawed metal glove, smiling.{/n} "But not just yet."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋眯起眼睛。{/n}“不要对我撒娇，猴子。我注定会离开你，{name}，只是迟早的事情。”{n}他用带着利爪的金属手套轻轻抚摸着你的脸，微笑起来。{/n}“不过，并不是此时此刻。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Do not play coy, mon-keigh. It will happen, {name}. One day." {n}He gently caresses your face with his fingers clad in his clawed metal glove, smiling.{/n} "But not just yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋眯起眼睛。{/n}“不要对我撒娇，猴子。我注定会离开你，{name}，只是迟早的事情。”{n}他用带着利爪的金属手套轻轻抚摸着你的脸，微笑起来。{/n}“不过，并不是此时此刻。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは目を細めた。{/n}「シラを切るな、モン＝ケイ。いずれはそうなるんだ、{name}。いつかはな」{n}彼は爪のついた金属グローブをはめた指で、あなたの顔を優しく撫でる。{/n}「だが、今はまだその時じゃない」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Do not play coy, mon-keigh. It will happen, {name}. One day." {n}He gently caresses your face with his fingers clad in his clawed metal glove, smiling.{/n} "But not just yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは目を細めた。{/n}「シラを切るな、モン＝ケイ。いずれはそうなるんだ、{name}。いつかはな」{n}彼は爪のついた金属グローブをはめた指で、あなたの顔を優しく撫でる。{/n}「だが、今はまだその時じゃない」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai plisse les yeux.{/n} « Pas de fausse timidité, mon-keigh. Cela arrivera, {name}. Un jour. » {n}Il vous caresse délicatement le visage avec les doigts de son gant métallique griffu, en souriant.{/n} « Mais pas tout de suite. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Do not play coy, mon-keigh. It will happen, {name}. One day." {n}He gently caresses your face with his fingers clad in his clawed metal glove, smiling.{/n} "But not just yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai plisse les yeux.{/n} « Pas de fausse timidité, mon-keigh. Cela arrivera, {name}. Un jour. » {n}Il vous caresse délicatement le visage avec les doigts de son gant métallique griffu, en souriant.{/n} « Mais pas tout de suite. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «No me venga con lisonjas, mon-keigh. Es algo que tiene que pasar, {name}». {n}Sonríe y acaricia suavemente tu cara con unos dedos cubiertos por un guante de metal con garras.{/n} «Pero no todavía».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Do not play coy, mon-keigh. It will happen, {name}. One day." {n}He gently caresses your face with his fingers clad in his clawed metal glove, smiling.{/n} "But not just yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «No me venga con lisonjas, mon-keigh. Es algo que tiene que pasar, {name}». {n}Sonríe y acaricia suavemente tu cara con unos dedos cubiertos por un guante de metal con garras.{/n} «Pero no todavía».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Ziert Euch nicht, Chem-Pan-Sey. Es wird geschehen, {name}. Eines Tages." {n}Er streichelt mit den Fingern seines metallenen Handschuhs lächelnd dein Gesicht.{/n} "Aber noch ist es nicht so weit."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Do not play coy, mon-keigh. It will happen, {name}. One day." {n}He gently caresses your face with his fingers clad in his clawed metal glove, smiling.{/n} "But not just yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Ziert Euch nicht, Chem-Pan-Sey. Es wird geschehen, {name}. Eines Tages." {n}Er streichelt mit den Fingern seines metallenen Handschuhs lächelnd dein Gesicht.{/n} "Aber noch ist es nicht so weit."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Aptala yatma mon-keigh. Bırakacağım {name}. Bir gün." {n}Pençeli metal eldiveninin içindeki parmaklarıyla yüzünü nazikçe okşayıp gülümsüyor.{/n} "Henüz değil ama."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows his eyes.{/n} "Do not play coy, mon-keigh. It will happen, {name}. One day." {n}He gently caresses your face with his fingers clad in his clawed metal glove, smiling.{/n} "But not just yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Aptala yatma mon-keigh. Olacak olan bu {name}. Bir gün." {n}Pençeli metal eldiveninin içindeki parmaklarıyla yüzünü nazikçe okşuyor ve gülümsüyor.{/n} "Henüz değil ama."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
